^.*(?:falls slack against the floor|falls on its side and lets out one last whimpering sigh of dark and shadowy whirlwinds|falls slack against the ground|exhales a sigh of relief and slumps to the ground motionless|falls to the floor, motionless|falls to the ground, a lifeless lump of flesh|shudders slightly then ceases his so called life|falls to the ground dead|collapses into a puddle of jelly, falling silent at last|hits the ground with a less than elegant thud|falls to the ground motionless|and dies|and lies still|goes still|going still|slowly settles to the ground and begins to dissipate|growls one last time, and crumples to the ground in a heap)\.$
